welcome.title: Welcome to PawGo
welcome.description: Your ultimate pet social network and community platform.

petProfiles.title: Pet Profiles
petProfiles.description: Manage your pet's profile information, including medical history, preferences, and more.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Learn about how we collect, use, and protect your personal information and pet data.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Connecting Hearts, One Paw at a Time
about.description: Learn about PawGo - the pet community platform connecting pet owners, service providers, and animal lovers worldwide.

hero.title: Connecting Hearts, One Paw at a Time
hero.description: PawGo is more than just a platform - we're a community of passionate pet lovers dedicated to creating meaningful connections, ensuring pet safety, and making pet ownership a joyful, supported experience for everyone.

beta.title: Beta Version
beta.description: PawGo is currently in beta. We're continuously improving based on user feedback.

beginning.heading: The Beginning
beginning.p1: PawGo started with a simple observation: pet owners needed a better way to connect, share experiences, and find trusted services for their beloved companions.
beginning.p2: What began as a small idea has grown into a comprehensive platform that serves thousands of pet families worldwide.

growing.heading: Growing Together
growing.p1: As our community has grown, so has our understanding of what pet owners truly need.
growing.p2: We've evolved from a simple networking platform to a comprehensive ecosystem that supports every aspect of pet ownership.
growing.p3: Our journey continues as we work to make pet ownership more accessible, safe, and enjoyable for everyone.

openSource.p1: We believe in transparency and community-driven development. That's why PawGo is open source.
openSource.p2: Check out our code on GitHub

founder.title: Meet Our Founder
founder.paragraph1: Mathieu is the sole creator of PawGo. A lifelong animal lover â€” PawGo grew after a cat joined the family; Mathieu's father brought the cat from a friend, and the cat now lives in Mathieu's home. That experience inspired him to build a safer, kinder place for pet owners to connect and help one another.
founder.paragraph2: Have questions or want to connect? Feel free to reach out at

quickFacts.github: Active open source contributor on GitHub
quickFacts.status: Solo developer building PawGo in beta
quickFacts.story: Inspired by personal pet adoption experience

safety.alertDescription: We implement comprehensive safety measures to protect both pets and their families at every interaction.

futureVision.title: Our Vision for the Future
futureVision.heroParagraph: We envision a world where every pet owner has access to a supportive community, professional services, and the resources they need to provide the best possible care for their companions.

joinUs.title: Join Our Community
joinUs.heroParagraph: Join thousands of pet families who have already discovered the joy of being part of the PawGo community.
joinUs.contactBlurb: Questions? We'd love to hear from you at

socialNetworking.description: Connect with fellow pet owners in your neighborhood and beyond.

emergencySupport.description: Get help when you need it most with our emergency network.

petSafety.title: Pet Safety Above All
petSafety.description: Every decision we make prioritizes the wellbeing and safety of pets and their families.

examples.backgroundChecks: Comprehensive background checks for service providers
examples.education: Continuous safety education for community members
examples.zeroTolerance: Zero tolerance for any form of animal abuse or neglect

communityFirst.title: Community First
communityFirst.description: We believe in the power of community to enrich the lives of both pets and their humans.

examples.connections: Fostering genuine connections between pet families
examples.localBusiness: Supporting local pet businesses and services
examples.inclusive: Creating inclusive spaces for all types of pet owners
examples.knowledge: Encouraging knowledge sharing and mutual support
examples.friendships: Building lasting friendships through shared pet love

transparency.description: We operate with complete transparency and work continuously to earn and maintain trust.

examples.communication: Clear, honest communication about policies and changes
examples.feedback: Open feedback channels and responsive support
examples.pricing: Transparent pricing with no hidden fees

innovation.description: We embrace technology and innovation to better serve pets and their families.

inclusivity.description: Every pet owner deserves access to community and care, regardless of circumstances.

examples.ecoFriendly: Promoting eco-friendly pet products and services

zeroHomelessness.title: Zero Pet Homelessness
zeroHomelessness.description: Working with shelters and rescues to ensure every pet finds a loving forever home.

misc.communityPartnerships: We're proud to partner with animal welfare organizations, veterinary clinics, and pet businesses to create a stronger, more connected pet community.

terms.title: Terms of Service

sections.userResponsibilities: 2. Your Responsibilities as a PawGo Member

alerts.welcomeDesc: By using our platform, you're joining a community dedicated to pet safety and responsible pet ownership.
alerts.importantDesc: If you don't agree with these terms, please don't use PawGo. We're here to protect everyone in our community.
alerts.petSafetyDesc: The wellbeing of pets is our top priority. These standards are non-negotiable.
